title: The Sims 3 Multi ultimate updated expandable repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
The Sims 3 (basegame only)

Repack features:

Do not cut/recode
Game Version - 1.67.2 (latest as of 11/09/2014);
Language : English; (all other languages are present)
Registry included: Yes;
Precracked - install and play (No origin or other bullshit required);
Install Time - 9 minutes [Quad Core];
Final size: 7.31gb;
Operating system: Win XP,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit and 64bit);

This basegame can be used to add any expansion/stuff pack you want. The game is updated to the latest version so every content will be compatible. You don't need to apply any CRACK.

How to add a new expansion/stuff pack?
Just download it's torrent from any scene group (RELOADED,FLT etc.) , install it anywhere on your pc. DON'T APPLY ANY CRACK even if it's mentioned in the description of that torrent, just open my sims 3 basegame, your expansion/stuff will be ready to use. You just have to install them. Install them in any order you want. Loading screen will always show the latest expansion/stuff pack.

The basegame language is english, the same language will be followed by expansion/stuff packs u install automatically. But u can change the language, Read 'Change Language' textfile provided to do that.

You can add more store content and worlds that you want. They should be decrapified files, easily available on torrents. As an example, i have included 'Roaring Heights Gold' world and 'BroadwalkSet' content. Extract them using Winrar from 'ROR.rar'. Instructions are included in on how to install them. 'Roaring heights' world will be added alongwith the default 'Sunset valley' world.

Read 'Performance Guide' textfile for the best performance. I am uploading this basegame for those users who want only selective packs without any troublesome experience and the others whose system lags on the complete collection of Sims 3.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS :

Backup your savegames and Uninstall any previous Sims 3 basegame or expansion/stuff pack from your system. Make sure no registry key is left behind and there is no 'Electronic Arts' folder in (My) Documents after the uninstall. This folder will be regenerated for this repack. You can try using your savegame with this.

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, click on 'Configure',, specify the install directory,, click on next and next,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, again next,, finally on 'Install',, after install,, play the game from desktop shortcut....

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid any savegame/crash issue. If it still crashes, lower the graphics settings from options ingame.

Don't download any patches or updates from the game launcher....Apply manual update if any in the future..... Origins and Ea download manager are not required....

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......

Check out my Official facebook page:
Like it guys to support and get updates on upcoming repacks.....
